title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 18 February 2012 - XWiki
content:
00:29 <Enygma`> has quit  
00:33 <evalica> has joined #xwiki  
00:35 <evalica> has quit  
02:07 <+sburjan`> sdumitriu: around ?  
02:08 <@sdumitriu> a triangle  
02:08 <+sburjan`> I have a short question  
02:08 <+sburjan`> I am analyzing the request/response headers of xwiki a little bit  
02:08 <+sburjan`> and I see that in the Response I get a "Expires Wed, 31 Dec 1969 23:59:59 GMT"  
02:09 <+sburjan`> why is this wrong ? is it set intentionately like this ?  
02:09 <@sdumitriu> For what kind of resource?  
02:09 <@sdumitriu> Just a document HTML?  
02:10 <+sburjan`> this is another thing  
02:10 <+sburjan`> I go to http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Community/BrowserSupportStrategy  
02:10 <+sburjan`> but in the Firebug console I only get this  
02:10 <+sburjan`> POST: http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/get/Community/BrowserSupportStrategy?xpage=xpart&vm=commentsinline.vm  
04:18 <DrLou\_> has quit  
05:58 <Denis1> has joined #xwiki  
05:58 <Denis> has quit  
08:58 <vmassol> has joined #xwiki  
09:28 <vmassol> good morning  
09:28 <vmassol> anyone knows why the following query will only return results for objects that have committer.aliases not empty:  
09:28 <vmassol> xwiki.queryManager.xwql("select committer.id, committer.aliases from Document doc, doc.object(GitHubCode.CommitterClass) as committer").execute().  
09:29 <vmassol> (committer.aliases is a static ilst)  
09:36 <vmassol> ok I know why… but that's strange  
09:37 <vmassol> it's because those fields were never set  
09:37 <vmassol> if I set them to an empty value they'll show up  
09:37 <vmassol> that's really strange  
10:42 <abusenius> has joined #xwiki  
11:01 <jvelo> has joined #xwiki  
11:01 <jvelo> Hi sdumitriu  
11:02 <jvelo> sorry I didn't answer on skype the first time, and now skype fails for me on linux  
11:03 <jvelo> re HTML doctype, yes, I'm interested in working on this  
11:04 <jvelo> I guess the first thing to do is make sure validation tests pass with the new doctype, and fix things  
11:55 <CIA-120> Jerome Velociter ldap-ui \* r783e4f3 https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-platform/commit/783e4f328380dc498032d68686abe7adfb658a5f / xwiki-platform-core/xwiki-platform-ldap/xwiki-platform-ldap-ui/src/main/resources/XWiki.AdminLdapSheet.xar : Removed .xar file commited by mistake - http://git.io/ZzuVLw  
11:55 <CIA-120> Jerome Velociter ldap-ui \* r6d5affe https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-platform/commit/6d5affe9970ffa49ae0aac70acacb0e85395ed7b / xwiki-platform-core/xwiki-platform-ldap/xwiki-platform-ldap-ui/src/main/resources/XWiki/AdminLdapSheet.xml : XWIKI-2551 Create a LDAP administration app ...  
11:55 <CIA-120> Jerome Velociter ldap-ui \* r929397c https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-platform/commit/929397cb5b1e99faefb1ce90f0562d8d9502badd / (2 files in 2 dirs): XWIKI-2551 Create a LDAP administration app - http://git.io/Drly7Q  
12:20 <evalica> has joined #xwiki  
12:26 <evalica> has quit  
12:39 <sburjan\_> has joined #xwiki  
12:43 <sburjan`> has quit  
12:43 <sburjan\_> is now known as <sburjan`>  
12:45 <sburjan\_> has joined #xwiki  
12:46 <sburjan`> has quit  
12:46 <sburjan\_> is now known as <sburjan`>  
13:54 <rrodriguez> HI! Anybody out there could check Javadoc for XWiki URLs available at XWiki API Reference?  
13:54 <rrodriguez> it seems to me that are failing...  
13:54 <rrodriguez> http://platform.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/DevGuide/API  
13:54 <rrodriguez> http://nexus.xwiki.org/nexus/service/local/repositories/releases/archive/org/xwiki/platform/xwiki-platform-oldcore/3.4/xwiki-platform-oldcore-3.4-javadoc.jar/!/index.html  
13:54 <rrodriguez> I got this error message...  
13:54 <rrodriguez> The server has not found anything matching the request URI  
13:55 <vmassol> rrodriguez: our nexus instance is non operational since the license has expired but I don't have the time right now to set up a new license (which we'll need to to get..) :(  
13:55 <rrodriguez> ok!  
13:55 <rrodriguez> I'm afraid I won't be able to help with this :(  
13:55 <vmassol> I'm sending a mail to sonatpye now  
13:56 <rrodriguez> thank!  
13:56 <rrodriguez> I'll try later or tomorrow! Thanks!  
13:57 <vmassol> mail sent  
13:58 <lucaa> has joined #xwiki  
14:04 <sburjan\_> has joined #xwiki  
14:07 <sburjan`> has quit  
14:07 <sburjan\_> is now known as <sburjan`>  
14:10 <vmassol> rrodriguez: shoukd be ok now  
14:10 <vmassol> jason just replied very fast with a temporary license :)  
14:19 <DrLou> has joined #xwiki  
14:23 <lucaa> has quit  
14:32 <rrodriguez> vmassol: thank you so much! Now, I must keep working all day long! :)  
14:32 <vmassol> oops sorry :)  
14:32 <rrodriguez> vmassol: you are always welcome!  
14:58 <sburjan`> vmassol: were you able to fix the issues with the Git Module ?  
15:13 <vmassol> sburjan`: see http://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/GitHub+Application  
15:13 <vmassol> got to go  
15:13 <vmassol> has quit  
15:26 <jvelo> has quit  
15:27 <jvelo> has joined #xwiki  
15:32 <jvelo> has quit  
16:55 <jvdrean> has joined #xwiki  
17:16 <jvdrean> has quit

17:27 <jvelo> sdumitriu: FYI I've started listing issues we need to fix/check for switching to HTML5, at http://jira.xwiki.org/browse/XWIKI-7552  
17:28 <@sdumitriu> jvelo: OK, great
